      • changeLocation

        public void changeLocation(int x,
                           int y,
                           char c)
        change content of one of the location on the map
        Parameters:
        x - row-coordinate of the location
        y - column-coordinate of the location
        c - the content you would like to change. 'c' = chest,'w'=wall, 'f'=floor, 'i' = indoor, 'o' = outdoor ...

        Parameters:
        x - row-coordinate of the location
        y - column-coordinate of the location
        cell - the cell which you would like to put in the map

      • checkValidation

        public boolean checkValidation(Map map)
        Parameters:
        map - map whose validation you would like to check
        Returns:
        cell the same function on the ValidationTool, return true if validation is success, else return false.
